title: Expanded graphite incorporated with Li4Ti5O12 nanoparticles as a high-rate lithium-ion battery anode
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11276-11283
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00832D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Junkang Zhao, Xiayu Zhu, Wenfeng Zhang, Jingyi Qiu, Feiyue Zhai, Huimin Zhang, Gaoping Cao, Shengji Gao, Fei Ding, Yu Xiang
In this work, expanded graphite incorporated with Li4Ti5O12 nanoparticles (EG/LTO) was synthesized via moderate oxidization of artificial graphite following a solution coating process. The EG/LTO displayed excellent power capability and cycle stablility.
